issues.title: DataGrid pro rowSelectionModel TS2739 error - type incompatible with GridRowSelectionModel after upgrade
issues.author: Dgarg2529
issues.body:
### The problem in depth

## Description
After upgrading DataGrid Pro, the rowSelectionModel prop throws a TypeScript compile error blocking our deployment. The type (string | number)[] is no longer compatible with GridRowSelectionModel, which now expects an object with type and ids properties.

Error:
TS2739: Type 'readonly (string | number)[]' is missing the following properties from type 'GridRowSelectionModel': type, ids

## Steps to reproduce
1. Install @mui/x-data-grid-pro (latest v8)
2. Create a DataGrid Pro component with rowSelectionModel typed as useState<(string | number)[]>([])
3. Pass it to the rowSelectionModel prop
4. Run TypeScript compilation
5. See TS2739 error

Order ID: 122939
issues.summary: rowSelectionModel type broke after upgrading to v8 - TS2739 error due to changed GridRowSelectionModel type
issues.suggestedAction: Needs maintainer review - migration guide may need update for GridRowSelectionModel type change

issues.title: Cell border sometimes remains expanded after exiting edit mode (regression from v6.7.0 to v6.20.4)
issues.author: web-delivery
issues.body: Regression: cell border intermittently remains in editing visual state after exiting edit mode. Worked in v6.7.0, broken in v6.20.4. ~10% repro rate. Order ID: 118470
issues.summary: Cell border stays expanded after exiting edit mode ~10% of the time, regression from v6.7.0 to v6.20.4
issues.suggestedAction: Needs maintainer review - confirmed regression with reproduction

issues.title: RichTreeViewPro lazy loading spinners reset when any prop reference changes
issues.author: BrentFarese
issues.body: deriveStateFromParameters unconditionally resets lazyLoadedItems to initial state on every call. Any non-memoized prop causes re-render which wipes loading state. Premium user. Order ID: 116348
issues.summary: Lazy loading spinners reset due to deriveStateFromParameters wiping lazyLoadedItems on every prop change
issues.suggestedAction: Needs maintainer review - root cause identified, fix suggested in issue

issues.summary: How to make master grid scrollbar consider width of expanded detail grids in multi-level master-detail

issues.title: DataGrid CSP Error: Emotion CacheProvider nonce is not used in inline styles
issues.author: visualjerk
issues.body: DataGrid doesn't pick up nonce from Emotion CacheProvider, causing CSP errors. Workaround: pass nonce directly to DataGrid. Has repro repo. Order ID: 109756
issues.summary: DataGrid ignores Emotion CacheProvider nonce for inline styles, causing CSP violations
issues.suggestedAction: Needs maintainer review - has reproduction repo and workaround

issues.title: ajv has ReDoS when using `$data` option
issues.author: damiangreen
issues.body: Moderate ajv vulnerability via x-license > x-telemetry > conf > ajv dependency. Workaround: pnpm override ajv>=8.18.0. Affects all MUI X packages.
issues.summary: ajv ReDoS vulnerability (GHSA-2g4f-4pwh-qvx6) via @mui/x-license > @mui/x-telemetry > conf > ajv
issues.suggestedAction: Needs maintainer review - security vulnerability affecting all MUI X packages
